Attributes.Description: Automatic positioning.

Name: SynchronousMachineKind
Description: Synchronous machine type.

Attributes.Name: generator
Attributes.Description: Indicates the synchronous machine can operate as a generator.

Attributes.Name: condenser
Attributes.Description: Indicates the synchronous machine can operate as a condenser.

Attributes.Name: generatorOrCondenser
Attributes.Description: Indicates the synchronous machine can operate as a generator or as a condenser.

Attributes.Name: motor
Attributes.Description: Indicates the synchronous machine can operate as a motor.

Attributes.Name: generatorOrMotor
Attributes.Description: Indicates the synchronous machine can operate as a generator or as a motor.

Attributes.Name: motorOrCondenser
Attributes.Description: Indicates the synchronous machine can operate as a motor or as a condenser.

Attributes.Name: generatorOrCondenserOrMotor
Attributes.Description: Indicates the synchronous machine can operate as a generator or as a condenser or as a motor.

Name: DisconnectingCircuitBreaker
Description: A circuit breaking device including disconnecting function, eliminating the need for separate disconnectors.

Name: PowerElectronicsConnectionPhase
Description: A single phase of a power electronics connection.

Attributes.Name: p
Attributes.Description: Active power injection. Load sign convention is used, i.e. positive sign means flow into the equipment from the network.

Attributes.Name: phase
Attributes.Description: Phase of this energy producer component.   If the energy producer is wye connected, the connection is from the indicated phase to the central ground or neutral point.  If the energy producer is delta connected, the phase indicates an energy producer connected from the indicated phase to the next logical non-neutral phase.

Attributes.Name: q
Attributes.Description: Reactive power injection. Load sign convention is used, i.e. positive sign means flow into the equipment from the network.

Name: Connector
Description: A conductor, or group of conductors, with negligible impedance, that serve to connect other conducting equipment within a single substation and are modelled with a single logical terminal.

Name: AsynchronousMachine
Description: A rotating machine whose shaft rotates asynchronously with the electrical field.  Also known as an induction machine with no external connection to the rotor windings, e.g. squirrel-cage induction machine.

Attributes.Name: asynchronousMachineType
Attributes.Description: Indicates the type of Asynchronous Machine (motor or generator).

Attributes.Name: converterFedDrive
Attributes.Description: Indicates whether the machine is a converter fed drive. Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909.

Attributes.Name: efficiency
Attributes.Description: Efficiency of the asynchronous machine at nominal operation as a percentage. Indicator for converter drive motors. Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909.

Attributes.Name: iaIrRatio
Attributes.Description: Ratio of locked-rotor current to the rated current of the motor (Ia/Ir). Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909.

Attributes.Name: nominalFrequency
Attributes.Description: Nameplate data indicates if the machine is 50 Hz or 60 Hz.

Attributes.Name: nominalSpeed
Attributes.Description: Nameplate data.  Depends on the slip and number of pole pairs.

Attributes.Name: polePairNumber
Attributes.Description: Number of pole pairs of stator. Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909.

Attributes.Name: ratedMechanicalPower
Attributes.Description: Rated mechanical power (Pr in IEC 60909-0). Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909.

Attributes.Name: reversible
Attributes.Description: Indicates for converter drive motors if the power can be reversible. Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909.

Attributes.Name: rr1
Attributes.Description: Damper 1 winding resistance.

Attributes.Name: rr2
Attributes.Description: Damper 2 winding resistance.

Attributes.Name: rxLockedRotorRatio
Attributes.Description: Locked rotor ratio (R/X). Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909.

Attributes.Name: tpo
Attributes.Description: Transient rotor time constant (greater than tppo).

Attributes.Name: tppo
Attributes.Description: Sub-transient rotor time constant (greater than 0).

Attributes.Name: xlr1
Attributes.Description: Damper 1 winding leakage reactance.

Attributes.Name: xlr2
Attributes.Description: Damper 2 winding leakage reactance.

Attributes.Name: xm
Attributes.Description: Magnetizing reactance.

Attributes.Name: xp
Attributes.Description: Transient reactance (unsaturated) (greater than or equal to xpp).

Attributes.Name: xpp
Attributes.Description: Sub-transient reactance (unsaturated).

Attributes.Name: xs
Attributes.Description: Synchronous reactance (greater than xp).

Name: TapChanger
Description: Mechanism for changing transformer winding tap positions.

Attributes.Name: controlEnabled
Attributes.Description: Specifies the regulation status of the equipment.  True is regulating, false is not regulating.

Attributes.Name: highStep
Attributes.Description:
Highest possible tap step position, advance from neutral.
The attribute shall be greater than lowStep.

Attributes.Name: initialDelay
Attributes.Description: For an LTC, the delay for initial tap changer operation (first step change).

Attributes.Name: lowStep
Attributes.Description: Lowest possible tap step position, retard from neutral.

Attributes.Name: ltcFlag
Attributes.Description: Specifies whether or not a TapChanger has load tap changing capabilities.

Attributes.Name: neutralStep
Attributes.Description:
The neutral tap step position for this winding.
The attribute shall be equal to or greater than lowStep and equal or less than highStep.
It is the step position where the voltage is neutralU when the other terminals of the transformer are at the ratedU.  If there are other tap changers on the transformer those taps are kept constant at their neutralStep.

Attributes.Name: neutralU
Attributes.Description:
Voltage at which the winding operates at the neutral tap setting. It is the voltage at the terminal of the PowerTransformerEnd associated with the tap changer when all tap changers on the transformer are at their neutralStep position.  Normally neutralU of the tap changer is the same as ratedU of the PowerTransformerEnd, but it can differ in special cases such as when the tapping mechanism is separate from the winding more common on lower voltage transformers.
This attribute is not relevant for PhaseTapChangerAsymmetrical, PhaseTapChangerSymmetrical and PhaseTapChangerLinear.

Attributes.Name: normalStep
Attributes.Description:
The tap step position used in "normal" network operation for this winding. For a "Fixed" tap changer indicates the current physical tap setting.
The attribute shall be equal to or greater than lowStep and equal to or less than highStep.

Attributes.Name: step
Attributes.Description:
Tap changer position.
Starting step for a steady state solution. Non integer values are allowed to support continuous tap variables. The reasons for continuous value are to support study cases where no discrete tap changer has yet been designed, a solution where a narrow voltage band forces the tap step to oscillate or to accommodate for a continuous solution as input.
The attribute shall be equal to or greater than lowStep and equal to or less than highStep.

Attributes.Name: subsequentDelay
Attributes.Description: For an LTC, the delay for subsequent tap changer operation (second and later step changes).

Name: ShortCircuitRotorKind
Description: Type of rotor, used by short circuit applications.

Attributes.Name: salientPole1
Attributes.Description: Salient pole 1 in IEC 60909.

Attributes.Name: salientPole2
Attributes.Description: Salient pole 2 in IEC 60909.

Attributes.Name: turboSeries1
Attributes.Description: Turbo Series 1 in IEC 60909.

Attributes.Name: turboSeries2
Attributes.Description: Turbo series 2 in IEC 60909.

Name: WindingConnection
Description: Winding connection type.

Attributes.Name: D
Attributes.Description: Delta.

Attributes.Name: Y
Attributes.Description: Wye.

Attributes.Name: Z
Attributes.Description: ZigZag.

Attributes.Name: Yn
Attributes.Description: Wye, with neutral brought out for grounding.

Attributes.Name: Zn
Attributes.Description: ZigZag, with neutral brought out for grounding.

Attributes.Name: A
Attributes.Description: Autotransformer common winding.

Attributes.Name: I
Attributes.Description: Independent winding, for single-phase connections.
